Subject: Visual Arts
Text: By the end of the Foundation year, students describe experiences, observations, ideas and/or feelings about arts works they encounter at school, home and/or in the community.
Keywords: foundation, year, describe, experiences, observations, ideas, feelings, about, arts, works

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: Students use play, imagination, arts knowledge, processes and/or skills to create and share arts works in different forms.
Keywords: play, imagination, arts, knowledge, processes, skills, create, share, works, different

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: By the end of Year 2, students identify where they experience visual arts.
Keywords: year, identify, where, experience, visual, arts

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They describe where, why and/or how people across cultures, communities and/or other contexts experience visual arts.
Keywords: describe, where, people, across, cultures, communities, other, contexts, experience, visual

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: Students experiment with visual conventions, visual arts processes and materials.
Keywords: experiment, visual, conventions, arts, processes, materials

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They make and share artworks in informal settings.

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: By the end of Year 4, students describe the use of visual conventions, visual arts processes and materials in artworks they create and/or experience.
Keywords: year, describe, visual, conventions, arts, processes, materials, artworks, create, experience

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They describe where, why and/or how visual artists create and/or display artworks across cultures, times, places and/or other contexts.
Keywords: describe, where, visual, artists, create, display, artworks, across, cultures, times

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: Students use visual conventions, visual arts processes and materials to create artworks that communicate ideas, perspectives and/or meaning.
Keywords: visual, conventions, arts, processes, materials, create, artworks, communicate, ideas, perspectives

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They share or display their artworks and/or visual arts practice in informal settings.
Keywords: share, display, artworks, visual, arts, practice, informal, settings

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: By the end of Year 6, students explain the ways that visual conventions, visual arts processes and materials are used in artworks they create and/or experience.
Keywords: year, explain, ways, visual, conventions, arts, processes, materials, used, artworks

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They describe how artworks created across cultures, times, places and/or other contexts communicate ideas, perspectives and/or meaning.
Keywords: describe, artworks, created, across, cultures, times, places, other, contexts, communicate

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They describe how visual arts are used to continue and revitalise cultures.
Keywords: describe, visual, arts, used, continue, revitalise, cultures

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: Students develop and document ideas for their own artworks.

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They select and use visual conventions, visual arts processes and materials to create artworks that communicate ideas, perspectives and/or meaning.
Keywords: select, visual, conventions, arts, processes, materials, create, artworks, communicate, ideas

Subject: Visual Arts
Text: They present documentation and artworks that communicate ideas, perspectives or meaning in informal and/or formal settings.
Keywords: present, documentation, artworks, communicate, ideas, perspectives, meaning, informal, formal, settings
